title: Interactive Theater and Role-Play-Based "Breaking Bad News" Training for Enhancing Medical Communication Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical communication knowledge (no patient counseling experience)
context.additional_context: Situational communication strategy practice through online collaboration with professional actors

learning_goals: Learners will explain ≥3 core elements (empathy, clarity, structure) of delivering bad news through cancer patient role-playing
Learners will improve communication skills ≥2 times based on peer feedback after role-play performance
Learners will present ≥3 strategies for managing emotional responses in patient-healthcare provider interaction scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
